page.title: 02The Sheep Farmer 1
page.content: {Question}What kind of animals do you have? {Answer}I have 2500 blackfaced sheep 20 cows and 20 calves. {Question}Did you have a good season last year? {Answer}Yes I had a good season last year because it was a hard winter and a hot summer which was good for the beasts. {Question}When does the year start for a farmer? {Answer}The year starts in November when the rams are to be put out to the hills.We have five main gatherings. One in spring dipping for ticks,one in June for marking the lambs and for shearing last years lambs.One is in July for shearing any that where missed in June and also for shearing the ewes.One in August for the sales and one in September for dipping.
